derivation: a primitive root (compare H2673 (חָצָה)lemma חָעָה ayin, corrected to חָצָה); also as denominative from H2671 (חֵץ)
strongs_def: properly, to chop into, pierce or sever; hence, to curtail, to distribute (into ranks);  to shoot an arrow
kjv_def: archer, [idiom] bands, cut off in the midst.
